Configuration.Name: L1=L2=14m_central_apx10
Configuration.SetupScript:
config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 13200 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g2' config.apx = -72 config.bs = 1 config.beamcenterx = 92.54 config.beamcenterz = 95.81
config.drive()
